page.title: 12Education.
page.content: {Cox Green Comprehensive.} The school educates 970 children.It has 56 teachers. The sports that they play are football,hockey,cricket, tennis basketball,netball and lots of other things. {White Waltham.}White Waltham school educates 103 children and has 3 part time teachers and 3 full time teachers.The sports they play are:football,rugby,tennis,netball. They go to school at 8.55 and go home at 3.30. {Ridgeway.}The school educates 137 pupils and has 8 full time teachers and three part time.The sports are swimming,cricket,rounders,athletics, football,mini rugby,jogging.The times they go to school & come home are 9.00am to 3.45pm.
